channel.title: ⚠ Main Street Tap and Grill ⚠ on MST&G
channel.description: Recent content in ⚠ Main Street Tap and Grill ⚠ on MST&G

item.title: Piss Drunk Man and Shots Fired Into the Air
item.description: Overserved man urinates publicly and driver fires into the air # The first shooting incident at Main Street Tap & Grill on Oct 13 at 1:31 a.m. Warning Graphic Content This video contains public urination and gunshots.

item.title: Overserved Man Breaks Womans Phone
item.description: Overserved man pushes and harasses a woman # Woman repeatedly tells him to leave her alone. After he smashes her phone on the parking lot, another man climbs down from the rooftop and intervenes. Warning Graphic Content Violence and language.

item.title: 19 Shots Fired
item.description: 19 Shots fired after bloody fight # On the morning of January 9, 2022 a fight broke out inside MST&G. We don’t have the details other than HPD said that there were broken bottles and blood everywhere. Warning Graphic Content This post contains a video that may be disturbing. 00:08 - Shooter comes from around the corner. 00:38 - Shooter pees on the building. 02:00 - Shooter finishes peeing and fires into the air.

item.title: Cook shot during disturbance at bar and grill in Houston Heights
item.description: Police: Cook shot during disturbance at bar and grill in Houston Heights # Original article can be viewed at the Houston Chronicle on their Local / Crime section here. A cook was shot early Saturday at a bar in Houston’s Greater Heights area, police said. Officers responded around 3 a.m. to a bar and grill on the 4000 block of North Main Street, where they found a man with a gunshot wound, said Lt.

item.title: Hit and Run
item.description: Hit and Run # A white Ford Ranger backs into the Honda Fit and drives away as a friend of the driver urinates in the parking lot Warning Graphic Content This video contains public urination.

item.title: Shoot Out
item.description: Fight over a hit car leads to a shoot out # Warning Graphic Content This video contains graphic language and gun violence. 3:54 - Vehicle hit leaving bar. Fight breaks out. 4:53 - Group comes from the bar. 5:50 - Some of the group tries to calm down the situation. 5:58 - Man pulls shirt off and wants to fight. 6:57 - Car peels out. 7:04 - Gunshots 7:22 - More gunshots 12:27 - HPD arrives.
